meanings.sent1: Her consistency in completing tasks on time is impressive.
meanings.sent2: The consistency of his answers throughout the interview showed his honesty.
meanings.sent3: The consistency of the cake batter made it easy to bake.
meanings.sent4: The consistency of his behavior was like a steady stream, never wavering.
meanings.sent5: The consistency of the sunrise every morning is a comforting sight.

meanings.definition: A degree of density, firmness, viscosity, or resistance to movement.
meanings.sent1: The consistency of the mud made it hard to walk through.
meanings.sent2: The consistency of the dough was perfect for making cookies.
meanings.sent3: The consistency of the jello wobbling on the plate was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The consistency of the traffic flow was like a slow-moving river.
meanings.sent5: The consistency of the glue made it ideal for sticking things together.
